body.p: The Board decided not to use the term ‘stewardship’ in the 2010 Conceptual Framework because there would be difficulties in translating it into other languages. Instead, the Board described what stewardship encapsulates. Accordingly, the objective of financial reporting in the 2010 Conceptual Framework acknowledged that users make resource allocation decisions as well as decisions as to whether management has made efficient and effective use of the resources provided.
